content: The key drivers of our cash activity for the year were $13.9 million used in operating activities, $1.5 million in capital expenditures, which represents our investment in our current manufacturing facility as well as in opportunities to expand our footprint and accelerate our capacity to support customer qualifications and scale up, $73.6 million net cash provided by financing activities driven by proceeds received in connection with the business combination and pipe investment, net of issuance costs plus proceeds from the exercise of stock warrants and options.
